text: Donald Trump Jr. enjoyed some quality time with his youngest child just a few hours after his wife, Vanessa Trump, filed for divorce. The businessman, 40, shared a sweet photo of himself relaxing with his daughter Chloe, 3, on Thursday, March 15. “ No matter what is going on bedtime cuddling with the smurf puts a Yuge smile on my face, ” he captioned the Instagram post, adding the hashtags # bedtime # daddysgirl # cuddle. He and Vanessa are also the parents of Kai, 10, Donald III, 9, Tristan, 6, and Spencer, 5.
